page.title: 03HAWLEY WOODS,COVE
page.content: Hawley Woods were once the grounds of {Minley Manor},a nineteenth century manor house built by the {Currie {family.} Hawley Woods is a place to enjoy.It is like a jungle. It has lots of trees most of them are evergreen.The ground is covered with pine needles twigs and cones.The{Scots pines}are tall and have branches only near the top. There are lots of{rhodedendrons}with beautiful purple flowers, which blossom in June. Part of Hawley woods is known as {Thompson's Field.}It is an old sports ground built between 1947 and 1949 by the 3rd regiment of the Royal Engineers led by Lieutenant-Colonel G. Thompson.D.S.O. O.B.E. It is a good place for wild flowers, including {orchids. }
